item.title: Point cloud alignment using Lie algebra machinery
item.description: Point cloud alignment using Lie algebra machinery Special Orthogonal group and vectorspaces Today I would like to cover the importance of Lie groups to the problems, that often arises in robotics field. The pose of the robot can be described through rotation and translation. Rotations, however, do not belong to the vector space: we are not allowed to sum the rotations or multiply them by a scalar, because the resulting element will not belong to SO(3) group.
